backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing user inquiries with access control, allowing submission, retrieval, and admin-only listing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping listing hero/header redesign tasks with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components, styles, hooks, and sections used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with OKLCH color tokens and global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing Header, all content sections, and Footer inside a full‑height layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section presenting organization description and a grid of four value propositions with icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form with validation, inquiry submission, status notices, and contact info panel.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeHer: Hero section with updated messaging, badges for course modes, background imagery, and smooth-scroll CTAs.
frontend/src/components/sections/Inquiry: Displays inquiry verification status and details by fetching inquiry data tied to the user's principal.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a grid of service cards describing various academic support offerings and levels.
frontend/src/components/sections/Streams: Shows academic streams with icons and example fields, plus a CTA for additional stream inquiries.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Provides footer with branding, navigation shortcuts, contact prompt, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/site/InlineNotic: Displays a styled inline success or error notice with corresponding icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, auto‑refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetInquiry.ts: Fetches an inquiry for a given principal using the actor, returning null if unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a React Query mutation that submits an inquiry via the actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom OKLCH color theme with light/dark mode variables and utility extensions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing the project state, features, requirements, and version information.
